DataElement.preferredName: Patient Other Medical Contraindicated Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there were additional or unlisted medical contraindications of patient .

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the additional or unlisted medical contraindications of patient .

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Medical; relating to the study or practice of medicine.:To indicate the inadvisability of (a medical treatment, for example). (Dictionary.com)

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Relating to the study or practice of medicine.
State of a particular method of treatment, regimen, procedure, medication, etc. of being unsuitable and inadvisable, often because of a likely adverse reaction.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Other medical condition which
ReferenceDocuments.description: Other medical condition which, in the opinion of the treating physician, would make this protocol unreasonably hazardous for the patient

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: No history of any medical or psychiatric condition or laboratory abnormality that in the opinion of the investigator may increase the risks associated with the study participation or investigational product(s) administration or may interfere with the interpretation of the results

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients must not have psychiatric or addictive disorders or other conditions that, in the opinion of the investigator, would preclude the patient from meeting the study requirements

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any condition which in the investigator's opinion makes the patient unsuitable for study participation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Medical or psychiatric condition that would prevent the patient from receiving the protocol therapy or providing informed consent

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does that patient have any medical history or conditions not otherwise previously specified which in the opinion of the investigator should exclude participation in this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a medical history or condition not otherwise previously specified which in the opinion of the investigator should exclude participation in this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ACRIN 6685
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an underlying medical condition that prevents them from being a surgical candidate?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Subjects with any concurrent condition, that, in the investigator's opinion, would jeopardize the safety of the subject or compliance with the protocol

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has a history or current evidence of any condition, therapy, or laboratory abnormality that might confound the results of the trial, interfere with the patient's participation for the full duration of the trial, or is not in the best interest of the patient to participate, in the opinion of the treating investigator

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has a history or current evidence of any condition, therapy, or laboratory abnormality that might confound the results of the trial, interfere with the patient's participation for the full duration of the trial, or is not in the best interest of the patient to participate, in the opinion of the treating investigator.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any medical conditions which would make this protocol unreasonably hazardous for the patient, including, but not limited to: contraindications to general endotracheal anesthesia; intracranial surgery; and stereotactic radiosurgery?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any conditions that, in the opinion of the clinician, would make this protocol unreasonably hazardous for the patient?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any other disease, metabolic dysfunction, physical examination finding, or clinical laboratory finding giving reasonable suspicion of a disease or condition that contraindicates the use of an investigational drug or that may affect the interpretation of the results or render the patient at high risk from treatment complications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any other conditions that, in the opinion of the investigator, would preclude the patient from meeting the study requirements or interfere with interpretation of study results?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-2 2018320v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 7/20/2022: fixed the box symbol in AQT.wz
